Municipal Development District Board of Directors

Meetings

  • Held as needed
  • Tuesday evenings
  • Oak Point City Hall
    100 Naylor Road
    Oak Point, TX 75068

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes

Members

The Municipal Development District Board of Directors members are appointed by the City Council and serve two-year staggered terms. Terms expire in July of each year. Currently, Economic Development Corporation members serve dual roles as Municipal Development District members.
  • Betsy Sellinger, Member
    Term expires: July 2027
  • James Hankins, Member
    Term expires: July 2027
  • Greg Weiler, Member
    Term expires: July 2026
  • Chris Risher, Vice President
    Term expires: July 2027
  • David Wootton, President
    Term expires: July 2026
  • Debbie Peterman, Member
    Term expires: July 2026

About the District

On May 14, 2011, voters in Oak Point and the Oak Point extraterritorial jurisdiction (ETJ) voted to create the Oak Point Municipal Development District (MDD) and impose a 0.25% sales and use tax within the Oak Point City limits and ETJ for the purpose of financing development projects beneficial to the MDD. Authorized projects include land, buildings, equipment, facilities, and improvements associated with:

  • Affordable housing
  • Business development in certain small municipalities
  • Business enterprises that create or retain primary jobs
  • Variety of recreational or community facilities
  • Water supply facilities and water conservation programs

The Board of the Oak Point MDD consists of seven members that recommend funding of authorized projects to the City Council.

  1. Board of Adjustment
  2. EDC Board of Directors
  3. Municipal Development District Board of Directors
  4. Parks & Recreation Commission
  5. Planning & Zoning Commission
  • Permits
